raw_body: RANASINGHE – BERNADETTE (BERNIE) – At Rest wtih Jesus. Daughter of the late Mr & Mrs John de S. Ranasinghe,​ sister of the late Watson,​ Girla,​ Margie,​ Joyce,​ Tinie,​ Bridget,​ Rodney and of Noeline and Maurille,​ sister-in-law of the late Mignonne,​ Bala,​ Claude,​ Michael,​ Brendan,​ Philomina,​ Doreen. Cortege leaves Barney Raymond’s Funeral Parlour,​ 21 December 2023 for Cremation at General Cemetery Kanatte at 3 p.m.084015
